title: (x) New $10 Party Cakes - What's the Sans? - Goudy Sans Bold Italic {Florian}
content:
Michel's Patisserie in Australia has launched some new $10 cakes, and I can't ID the sans used to advertise them.

You can see the font on their website here: [http://www.michels.com.au/](http://web.archive.org/web/20140803023916/http:/www.michels.com.au/ "http://www.michels.com.au/")

and in the attached poster.

Can anyone help?

Thanks!
author: Sye

comments.content: Ok, the Image seems to have disappeared.... sorry guys.
Very much like LTC Goudy Sans Italic

That would be [Goudy Sans Bold Italic](http://web.archive.org/web/20140803023916/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/adobe/itc-goudy-sans/?testdrive=dock%3Dfalse%26size%3D87%26w%3D720%26src%3Dcustom%26text%3DNew%2520%252410%2520Party%2520Cakes%2520in%2520stor%2520now!%26fg%3D000000%26bg%3Dffffff%26goodies%3Dfit%252Cot.liga%26seed%3D28).  
F
Awesome, thanks all! Sorry for the image issues.
I love the lowercase italic. The upper not so much, but the lower italic is great!
The spacing looks a bit weird.
